name: Sporehead
otherNightReminder: If nobody died during the day, the Sporehead and all Spored players die. For each player killed this way, mark 2 alive players as Spored
ability: Each night*, if no-one died today, you do & 2 alive players gain this ability. If 5 or more live, players you nominate & execute live.
flavor: I'm a fun guy to be around
